repository.orgName: Staats- und UniversitätsBibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
This is a rare text. It is a commentary on the Padukāsahasracitrapaddhati, a part of Padukāsahasra stotra by Rāmānujācāryya. The front broken guard folio with title and the some matter written in the left margin. Title right side of the folio, half of the title is not readable as the sticker with shelf mark is glued. Rāmānujā [some letters are not legible due to the sticker.] ya ? citrapaddhati [some letters are not legible due to the sticker.] yā Sticker of shelf mark 62 printed and 60 is written with blue pencil. Number 62 is written in pink pencil at the middle of the folio. The Verso of back guard folio has written numbers 62 and 36 in roman in red pen. The front guard folio is broken mesurements are hight 30 mm maximum and 15mm minimum. Width maximum 143mm and minimum 130.
The end of the manuscript did not match with the published version of the text but the beginning of the text is same.

msItem.title: Padukāsahasracitrapaddhativyākhyā
msItem.author: Śrinivāsa
msItem.rubric: śrīmānveṁkaṭanāthāryyaḥ kavitārkikakesarī vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṁ sadā hṛdi
msItem.incipit:
athāsyāṁ paddhatyāṁ pādukāviṣayān
śabdapradhānān ślokānudāharati pratiṣṭhāṁ sarvacitrāṇāṁ prapadye maṇipādukāṁ vicitrajagadādhāro voṣṇuryatra pratiṣṭhitaḥ pra|
msItem.finalRubric:
oṁ ātreya kulatilakaṁ śriśrīrāmānujāryyanaṁdanasya
śrinivāsakaveḥ kṛtiṣu citrkṛtisuvyākhyāsaṁpūrṇā
paraguṇaparidānepustanāśeṣakunyaḥ nijaguṇamalināni lokamā dayantaḥ aviditaparadoṣakñānapīyuṣapurṇāḥ
karakṛtamaparādhaṁ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ bindu nāḥ

support.p: Thick palm leaf as guard folio. Front guard folio is broken.

extent.measure:
2 guard folios, 62 written folios. Folio
is blank and not numbered.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals are used for numbering folio.
supportDesc.condition: Most of the folio are broken at the edges.

handNote.desc: Writing is not legible. Letters are spread out and it is difficult to understand if the letter is vi or pi. Cluster letters are also very challenging to read.

additions.desc:
Broken guard folio with title and the some matter written in the left margin. Rāmānujā [some letters are not legible due to the sticker.] ya ? citrapaddhati [some letters are not legible due to the sticker.] yā Sticker of shelf mark 62 printed and 60 is written with blue pencil. Number 62 is written in pink pencil at the middle of the folio. In the left side is written
khyāne
saṁkhyāstinipāhāryyāṇāṁ

hariḥ oṁ is written in the left margin of the folio
. Also the sticker of shelf mark is glued in the margin. Number 62 is printed on the sticker.

listBibl.bibl: The Padukāsahasram Of Venkat Ranganath Deshika With the commentary by Srinivas, edited by Pandit Kedaranath and Wasudev Lakshman Shastri Panshikar, Chaukhmba Sanskrit Series Kavyamala series reprint 1984.

encodingDesc.p: Dots are used to show that the text is continued.

TEI.text:
śrīmānveṁkaṭanāthāryyaḥ kavitārkikakesarī vedāntācāryavaryo me sannidhattāṁ sadā hṛdi athāsyāṁ paddhatyāṁ pādukāviṣayān
śabdapradhānān ślokānudāharati pratiṣṭhāṁ sarvacitrāṇāṁ prapadye maṇipādukāṁ vicitrajagadādhāro voṣṇuryatra pratiṣṭhitaḥ pra.
……| adhastanavidhyādiko
niriti kaviprabandhanāmagarbhamekākṣarātmakaṁ vākyaṁ dṛśyate
oṁ ātreya kulatilakaṁ śriśrīrāmānujāryyanaṁdanasya
śrinivāsakaveḥ kṛtiṣu citrkṛtisuvyākhyāsaṁpūrṇā
paraguṇaparidānepustanāśeṣakunyaḥ nijaguṇamalināni lokamā dayantaḥ aviditaparadoṣakñānapīyuṣapurṇāḥ
karakṛtamaparādhaṁ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ bindu nāḥ
